actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md.

summary.text: Authorizes the transfer of jurisdiction of specific lands (designated "Transfer of Land for Washington Aqueduct Shops and Storehouse Projects") in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Maryland, for purposes of facilitating the administration of such land.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md.
